scripts.deploy: npm run clean && dotenv -e .env.production -- parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && find dist -name '*.mp4' -delete && gh-pages -d dist && echo "deployed to: https://radogit.github.io/cocoarui-vr/" && echo "check status on: https://github.com/radogit/cocoarui-vr/deployments"
scripts.generate-cert: openssl req -x509 -nodes -days 365 -newkey rsa:2048 -keyout localhost-key.pem -out localhost.pem -config cert-extensions.cnf -extensions v3_req
